In other news, KSC and Duna Spacedock have been trying to figure out what the hell is going on at Volcas. Nothing new so far, just some activity. If you ask me, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s the dust storms. Those things can be pretty violent, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve heard, and it wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t surprise me to see the top of the old habitation unit blown off with a big enough gust.
